title: Please explain why Tibbers needs that buff.

replies.body: We're putting power into Tibbers both to shift power from Annie's burst into something more interactive and to amplify one of the most interesting and distinct parts of her kit (a really powerful, long duration pet).

You may need to reduce her upfront burst a little more. From my experiences so far, it seems like the relatively small amount of upfront damage she lost in the immediate burst combo is made up for by tibbers wailing on the person he's summoned on while they're still stunned. She's probably ended up a bit too strong as a result. Design-wise though, great change.
I feel like I'm in the minority, but I love this new change. Annie's so much more fun now that Tibbers has actual AI.

Why was the  delay for xerath's ult needed? this makes it extremely hard to land against players in higher elos. Normally i'd be able to land quite a few but had a difficult time with the delay increase in between off the few games i've played.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IfN9EP7i,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-05T00:24:01.194+0000)
>
> We're putting power into Tibbers both to shift power from Annie's burst into something more interactive and to amplify one of the most interesting and distinct parts of her kit (a really powerful, long duration pet).

I really like this change... the concept of annie is her relationship with tibbers is one of the biggest things about her and now i can actually feel that connection with her new kit. thx :D ( Although I do hate playing against her XD)

Because they nerfed her burst in response?  

Not to mention, I've seen more then a few Annie players talk about a kit where Tibbers was more integral.  He was already insanely strong for a spawn before 6.9, now it's just a bit more highlighted.

To be honest I just played against her rework yesterday and her burst, which is supposed to be nerfed, is quite as strong. At level 6, she could burst me right down from full hp to about 100... That's a bit too much for someone who should rely on her pet.
Meanwhile fiddle is all over the place zzzzzzzzz rework that shit already
So you're saying you want Annie to have her burst back?
because Tibbers was a dumb bear that you needed to tell him EVERYTHING to do every second or he will forget and want to follow you
"Tibbers say his own name a lot, or else he forget! Has happened before." {{champion:36}}
